search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=diskio.write_time host=* name=* by metric_name, name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(diskio.*) as "*_counter" by _time, name | streamstats current=f last(*_counter) as "*_prev" by name | eval write_time=(write_time_counter-write_time_prev) | fields _time, name, write_time | where NOT (write_time<0) | timechart useother=f limit=45 minspan=1m bins=1000 avg(write_time) as write_time by name
